page.title: 20LANGTOFT COUNTY PRIMARY SCH.
page.content: The school was built in 1859 and the original building had two classrooms and now another two mobiles have been built.The Earl of Ancaster had a field behind the school it is now the school field.There are 115 children in the school and 5 teachers Mr Platt,headmaster, Mrs Worral,Mr McGlynn Mrs Scott and Mrs Taylor another teacher will be here next term.A new school is being built and should be finished next year.The new school will be built at Manor Close in the West End of the village. The new school is to be built in 1985/1986 to be ready for use by September 1986.The new school will have five classrooms a hall and many other things our old school lacks. by Nicholas Baddeley
